languages.text: "Да... знаем..." {n}Новый приступ кашля прерывает речь женщины.{/n} "Это все они... проклятые мутанты! У них логово где-то под нашим блоком, мы видели много раз, как они в тенях шмыгают..."

"We do... we know..." {n}Another coughing fit interrupts the woman's words.{/n} "It's them... those damned mutants! They have a hideout somewhere under our block, we used to see them skulking in the shadows all the time..."
languages.original_text: "Да... знаем..." {n}Новый приступ кашля прерывает речь женщины.{/n} "Это все они... проклятые мутанты! У них логово где-то под нашим блоком, мы видели много раз, как они в тенях шмыгают..."

traits.locale_text: "Yes... we know..." {n}Another coughing fit interrupts the woman's words.{/n} "It's them... those damned mutants! They have a hideout somewhere under our block, we used to see them skulk in the shadows all the time..."

"We do... we know..." {n}Another coughing fit interrupts the woman's words.{/n} "It's them... those damned mutants! They have a hideout somewhere under our block, we used to see them skulking in the shadows all the time..."

languages.text: “我们知道……确实知道……”{n}女人的话被另一声咳嗽打断。{/n}“都是他们……是那些该死的变种人！他们在这条街区下面有个藏身之处，我们见过他们在阴影之中穿行……”
languages.original_text: "We do... we know..." {n}Another coughing fit interrupts the woman's words.{/n} "It's them... those damned mutants! They have a hideout somewhere under our block, we used to see them skulking in the shadows all the time..."

traits.locale_text: “我们知道……确实知道……”{n}女人的话被另一声咳嗽打断。{/n}“都是他们……是那些该死的变种人！他们在这条街区下面有个藏身之处，我们见过他们在阴影之中穿行……”

languages.text: «Sí... lo sabemos...». {n}Otro ataque de tos interrumpe a la mujer.{/n} «Son ellos... ¡esos malditos mutantes! Tienen un escondrijo en este bloque, solíamos verlos reptar por las sombras...».
languages.original_text: "We do... we know..." {n}Another coughing fit interrupts the woman's words.{/n} "It's them... those damned mutants! They have a hideout somewhere under our block, we used to see them skulking in the shadows all the time..."

traits.locale_text: «Sí... lo sabemos...». {n}Otro ataque de tos interrumpe a la mujer.{/n} «Son ellos... ¡esos malditos mutantes! Tienen un escondrijo en este bloque, solíamos verlos reptar por las sombras...».

languages.text: 「本当に…知っています…」{n}激しく咳き込む別の声の主が、女の言葉を遮る。{/n}「アイツらです…あのおぞましい変異体！この区画のどこかをコッソリ棲家にしていたんです。物陰でチョロチョロするのを何度か見かけました…」
languages.original_text: "We do... we know..." {n}Another coughing fit interrupts the woman's words.{/n} "It's them... those damned mutants! They have a hideout somewhere under our block, we used to see them skulking in the shadows all the time..."

traits.locale_text: 「本当に…知っています…」{n}激しく咳き込む別の声の主が、女の言葉を遮る。{/n}「アイツらです…あのおぞましい変異体！この区画のどこかをコッソリ棲家にしていたんです。物陰でチョロチョロするのを何度か見かけました…」

languages.text: "Wirklich ... wir wissen es ..." {n}Ein weiterer Hustenanfall unterbricht die Frau.{/n} "Sie waren es ... diese verdammten Mutanten! Sie haben irgendwo unter unserem Block ein Versteck, wir haben sie immer im Schatten herumschleichen sehen ..."
languages.original_text: "We do... we know..." {n}Another coughing fit interrupts the woman's words.{/n} "It's them... those damned mutants! They have a hideout somewhere under our block, we used to see them skulking in the shadows all the time..."

traits.locale_text: "Wirklich ... wir wissen es ..." {n}Ein weiterer Hustenanfall unterbricht die Frau.{/n} "Sie waren es ... diese verdammten Mutanten! Sie haben irgendwo unter unserem Block ein Versteck, wir haben sie immer im Schatten herumschleichen sehen ..."

languages.text: « C'est vrai... On sait... » {n}Les paroles de la femme sont à nouveau interrompues par une quinte de toux.{/n} « C'est eux... C'est ces saletés de mutants ! Ils ont une planque quelque part sous notre bloc, on arrêtait pas de les voir rôder dans l'obscurité... »
languages.original_text: "We do... we know..." {n}Another coughing fit interrupts the woman's words.{/n} "It's them... those damned mutants! They have a hideout somewhere under our block, we used to see them skulking in the shadows all the time..."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vrai... On sait... » {n}Les paroles de la femme sont à nouveau interrompues par une quinte de toux.{/n} « C'est eux... C'est ces saletés de mutants ! Ils ont une planque quelque part sous notre bloc, on arrêtait pas de les voir rôder dans l'obscurité... »

languages.text: "Evet... Biliyoruz..." {n}Kadının sözleri, öksürük nöbetiyle bir kez daha kesiliyor.{/n} "Onlar işte... Lanet mutantlar! Bizim blokun altında bir yerlerde saklanıyorlar. Gölgelerde sinsice dolaşır dururlardı hep."
languages.original_text: "We do... we know..." {n}Another coughing fit interrupts the woman's words.{/n} "It's them... those damned mutants! They have a hideout somewhere under our block, we used to see them skulking in the shadows all the time..."
